text: The Microsoft Surface Laptop 5 is a laptop computer developed by Microsoft. It was released on 25 October 2021. it is currently runs Windows 11. It supports Thunderbolt 4 and Intel Alder Lake processor. == Reviews == The Guardian reviews the Surface Laptop 5, it has good reviews like good keyboard and trackpad, USB-A, good screen, Windows Hello and no bloatware installed by itself, it has bad reviews like no SD card reader, only one USB-C charger port, battery life much worse than best and more costs. The Verge reviews the Surface Laptop 5, it has good reviews like very fast single-core processor and 3:2 screen, it has bad reviews like still has a 720p camera. == References == Category:Microsoft Surface
title: Surface Laptop 5
